sentences.sentence: Those involved had to uncurl the "cigars" whose fragility was a conservator's nightmare.
sentences.translation: 棘手的问题就是如何展开这些“雪茄”，手稿的脆弱性对于管理员是恶梦。

sentences.sentence: He watched the leaves uncurl and spread upon the surface of the water, unable to bear drinking the precious stuff.
sentences.translation: 他看着那些茶叶在水上伸展泡开，舍不得去喝这么值钱的东西。

sentences.sentence: As I slowly uncurl my fingers, he bends to look at the pea-size moth paralyzed with fear in the center of my hand.
sentences.translation: 我慢慢展开蜷曲的手指，让他弯身察看我手心中那只如豆般大、恐惧无力的蛾。
